LightningComponentBundle.description: Loads list of records for any custom Object Defined by the Admin. It also broadcast the record id on user row selection so other dependent components on the page can refresh with record scope.

property.name: objectName
property.label: Enter the API Name of the Object to load Records

property.name: numRecsDisplay
property.label: Enter the number of records to display on the list (between 1 and 12)

property.name: broadcastFieldName
property.label: Enter the API Name of the Object field that you would like to boradcast to other LCs on the page when user selects a record

property.name: showNewRecButton
property.label: Show New Record button on header?

property.name: filterbyFieldName
property.label: Enter the API Name of the Object Field that you would like to filter the list by

property.name: filterbyFieldValue
property.label: Enter the Value of the Object Field that you would like to filter the list by

property.name: sortFieldAPIName
property.label: Default Sort By - Field API Name
